description: Try our easy to follow Fruit Granola Parfaits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Parfait,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Father's Day,Strawberry,Halal,High protein,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Fruit Granola Parfaits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put strawberries and sugar into a medium saucepan. Cook, stirring, over medium heat for 8 minutes or until sugar dissolves and strawberries soften. Transfer to a bowl.
Place 2 tbs granola, 1/4 cup yoghurt, 2 tbs strawberry compote and 2 tbs papaya into six 11/2-cup capacity glasses. Repeat layers and serve.
